answers.answer: CHF = congestive heart failure?  At 37 he definitely needs to turn around whatever he can via diet and exercise.   Diabetes, poor circulation - no / weak erections should not be surprising.   I wish you luck - if he's doing all he can to improve his health and physical conditioning, then in time the situation should improve.  If not, time for a serious change in attitude - walk an hour a day, eat better, get in as good a shape as (safely) possible.

question: My husband is 37 yrs old with health issues he has CHF, diabetes, kidney diease, diabetes, he has ED. We tried levitra and it did nothing. Is there any other suggestions on taking this medication.
title: My husband levitra is no help....
